captions.text: Guide us to the straight path
The Obsession with Beauty
Today we want to discuss beauty
It's a natural topic
Humans like beauty in all its forms
But the love of beauty can deviate from the straight path
and is transformed into exaggerations and obsessions
That's when it becomes a problem
For example, the obsession with slender necks
In some areas of Burma they have an obsession that relates to the length of a woman's neck
The longer the neck is, the more beautiful a woman is
Children are made to wear rings starting from five years of age
Every year they add more rings
they can reach up to 30 cm in length
and approximately 10 kg in weight
All of this to draw attention and for the obsession of beauty
Another example of this obsession is in Japan
The rich families used to bind their daughter's feet
when they are 3-4 years old for their feet to stop growing
because one of the signs of beauty there are small feet
They used to disfigure their children
to the extent that they couldn't walk properly
The bones in the foot would become bent and deformed
While filming this episode I was bewildered and questioned who created these standards of beauty
Who sits and says that women, for example, are more beautiful with smaller feet so let's bind them
This is what is considered a beautiful foot size for grown women
4 inches long, 15 centimeters
This phenomenon also occured in China, which prevented women from walking properly because of the deformation of their feet
Allah (SWT) created everything in proportion
and he created our feet to be a certain size to withstand the weight of our bodies
So when we obstruct this development for a distorted vision of beauty
It's a deficiency [in the mind]
One of the technological methods to change forms
from the natural to unnatural is this
"Photoshop"
The last time I did something like this for the show
was maybe eight years ago and I've never done it again
Notice that he has to take so many pictures for just one to work
which doesn't even represent you
I imagine everyone has a picture like that
that they upload on Facebook, Twitter and every platform and never change
This is what happened after we finished taking pictures
The mission now is to select one picture out of the thousands that were taken
We finally found a picture that doesn't represent me
It took an hour to retouch the photo
He made me look like I'm 20 years old
Good appearances are desired in Islam
As a companion of the Prophet said: "A visitor came to the Prophet (PBUH)
and he was disheveled, his hair was not combed
So the Prophet (PBUH) asked 'Did he not find anything to tame his hair?'"
This is Islam's view: moderation
One shouldn't neglect himself
nor have an obsession with beauty
The obsession with beauty develops when the average person opens a magazine or TV
and sees these images, which are not real or natural
and expects the same standards from his wife
and when a woman sees her self worth in society connected to her beauty
because she feels like the society does not respect or appreciate her except through her looks and external beauty
The whole system is flawed and the whole society is responsible for this obsession with beauty
Now the doctor is analyzing my face to point out the thousands of flaws
Only God is Perfect
I have brown spots
One of the reasons for this obsession with beauty is that people view themselves more negatively than how society views them so they resort to plastic surgery
6-7 women participated in an interesting experiment
An artist, who did not see the women, drew each woman as she described herself to him
Afterwards they brought the other women in the experiment who met her to describe her to the artist
They then compared the two drawings
They then brought the women and showed them both drawings
They found that the women described themselves much more negatively than society's image of them
Hence, the latter image (from the peers' description0 was much more attractive
They found that the women were be concerned about certain features that society didn't even notice
There's a true story of a handsome man that married a beautiful woman
When the couple had children, the husband was shocked that they were not attractive considering that both parents were attractive
so he sued the mother, thinking that she had cheated with another man and that the children were not his
Her defense was that she had undergone plastic surgery and that the children looked like her real self
The husband actually ended up suing her for this deception and he won
This is completely opposite to Islamic principles
When we get engaged we can't even change our hair
so that there isn't any deception
The poor man from the story was deceived. The problem isn't the wife's appearance, it's the deception.
There is wisdom when God creates you in a certain shape or form
He has favored some over others in wealth, others in beauty, others in strength, height, affable personalities and other things
Every person has something
Everything God has given you is a blessing that should provide inner peace
Let's quickly go over some statistics about plastic surgery across the globe
Imagine that, in the past 10 years
The number of plastic surgeries has increased by over 700%
In 2011, 15 million people underwent plastic surgery
Around the world there are about 20,000 licensed plastic surgeons
Also, imagine, in 2013 alone, 40 billion dollars was spent on plastic surgery
This money could solve all of Africa's problems, the whole continent of Africa
This includes problems related to water
electricity
hunger and other challenges there
It's important to know the history of plastic surgery
because there's a justification for every action
Plastic surgery as we now know it first began after World War 1 and 2
Thousands of soldiers returned home disfigured from the wars
These are some real representations from that period
So these people needed reconstruction of features,
not for beautification but to return to a more natural form
Reconstruction after deformation is fine
but gradually this transformed into fixing perceived imperfections
For example, wanting the lips of a specific actress
In these cases, there aren't any deformities in the body - just in the mind.
They've put pictures here even worse than the ones on display
My goodness,
These are pictures of disfigured soldiers after WW1 and WW2
which propelled the science and study of plastic surgery
We have a whole episode about debt and loans
and how people are in debt, not for necessities, but for luxuries and pleasures
We were shocked to find that in an Arab country, banks offered special loans for plastic surgery!
[Billboard: I always look youthful, what's my secret?]
So his secret is supposed to be plastic surgery
Why should people aim to always look youthful?
Why don't we accept that God has created us to live different life stages?
That one ages from youth to elderly
This is a natural progression that God has provided for us
Why don't we accept this? There's nothing better than for one to live and act like their age
Society actually frowns upon people who act much younger than their age
Even people in the West have begun to notice that this obsession with beauty is problematic and affects people's psyche
A woman decided to give up beauty and fashion for an entire year, and wrote down her experience in a book called 'The Beauty Experiment'
She described that year as the most content she had ever been and the one with the most inner peace and confidence
She felt as if she had been freed from the captivity of other people's opinions of her
[Quote from the book] "The eternal search for beauty prevents us from reaching happiness, confidence and clarity"
It's a good book, I recommend that you read it, it can be found on Amazon
In some countries a type of obsession with beauty is that women should be voluptuous
There, the more voluptuous a woman is, the more beautiful she is in the eyes of the men of that society
So what does that community do? Some people have a custom of force feeding girls
Girls have to drink four to five liters of milk a day
Why? Supposedly women do not get married if they are not voluptuous
I'm sorry for showing these scenes but this is reality
It's shocking that in the 21st century, this is real
They force the girls to drink milk to the point that they can't and they throw up
The girls would be punished for not eating. The pieces of wood inflict pain so that the girl is distracted from vomiting
Many girls' fingers and hands break from this pressure
All of this for the pleasure of men who perceive voluptuous women as more beautiful
Problematic perceptions about beauty are also instilled at young ages in the USA and the West
They have beauty queens for every age
From zero to one year of age
from one year of age to three years old
from three to five
and so on and so forth
50 competitions? They're dressing her to look like an adult model
I really want to confront them but I don't them to kick us out just yet so let's save the argument for the end
This is the competition for children from 0 to 2 years of age
See that kid struggling to play, that's what they want to be doing, playing
Look at this baby, she's asleep!
What we saw was really disturbing
The baby is asleep and they're toting her around under the lights and with all that music and commotion
This is against nature
This is the child that's already been in 50 competitions
Boys participate in these competitions too
She's crying on stage
This is a type of torture of children
This is the same girl that was crying on stage
When she was left to play she became so happy
The prize ceremony
The baby is still asleep amidst this commotion
Just for your information, not all Americans approve of this
Some oppose this, including Mr. Andrew who didn't want to appear on camera but was really disturbed by this
There is a difference between this obsession and ensuring that you are healthy and presentable, which is a responsibility entrusted to you from God
The Prophet (PBUH) always carried a brush, musk and miswak and was always presentable
In Islam, there is no understanding that the more pious you are the less you should care about your appearance
You shouldn't look disheveled or neglect your appearance under the guise that these are unwanted aesthetics
According to Islamic principles, we should care about improving our appearances without changing our nature.

comments.text:
نسبه العنوسه ف السعوديه كبيره موو موضوع لانهم مووو جميلات فيه اسباب كثيره 
واضحه سببها العنوسه .. مهرهم . طلباتهم .. اشياء كثير وبظن هن اعلم .. و معظم 
شباب السعوديه يتزوجون يمانيات موو بس لانهم جميلات والله .. لان بنات اليمن 
معروفين ب الاخلاق وطيب ف مستحيل رجل سعودى متزوج يمنيه تروح تخونه او بس تفكر 
ب فلوسه وغير كذا مهر البنت معقول رغم جمالها وتمسكها بدينهاا .. هذا الى جذب 
معظم رجال السعوديه لزواجهم من يمانيات .. ﻿
